summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Bible Lesson Planner Stripe subscription pricing features. All backend pricing/subscription/checkout APIs (12 tests) passed. All frontend pricing page features verified working: Individual plans (Starter $9.99, Unlimited $19.99), Organization plans (4 church tiers from $29.99-$199.99), tab switching, FAQ accordion, and Stripe checkout redirect.
seed_data_creation: Test users created during backend tests with unique UUIDs for isolation
context_for_next_testing_agent: Pricing and subscription features fully tested and working. Real Stripe integration (sk_test_emergent) creates valid checkout sessions that redirect to Stripe. Individual tab shows 2 plans, Organization tab shows 4 plans. All prices match requirements: Starter ($9.99), Unlimited ($19.99), Small Church ($29.99), Medium Church ($59.99), Large Church ($99.99), Enterprise ($199.99).

backend_apis: GET /api/pricing/plans - Returns correct individual (2) and organization (4) plans
GET /api/subscription - Returns user subscription status (free tier for new users)
POST /api/checkout/create-session - Creates Stripe checkout session (all 6 plans)
frontend_features: Individual tab displays Starter ($9.99) and Unlimited ($19.99) plans
Organization tab displays Small ($29.99), Medium ($59.99), Large ($99.99), Enterprise ($199.99)
Checkout buttons redirect to Stripe checkout page
Design: Good contrast, spacing, and visual hierarchy

verification.stripe_integration: REAL - Using sk_test_emergent key, creates actual Stripe checkout sessions
verification.checkout_redirect: Verified - Button click redirects to https://checkout.stripe.com with correct amount
